name: Edge case: minimal input with near-zero context

userMessages.content: A button that exports data to a spreadsheet. It's on our admin dashboard.
The dashboard shows a table of user activity logs. The button should export whatever is currently displayed - with any active filters applied. CSV format is fine.

expectedOpenQuestions: Is there a maximum number of rows that can be exported?
Should the export include all columns or a configurable subset?
Who has permission to use the export function?
What is the underlying intent - why do admins need this export?
